item.title: Using R and Python Together
item.description: Why use both? Have you ever wanted to use both R and python simultaneously? Have you every forgotten how to do something in R but could remember how to do it in python? If you answered yes to either question I have the perfect package for you!! If you answered no to both just keep reading, it will be worth your time. What is this mystery package? So, you might be asking yourself what is this magical package that you are talking about.
